plot outline: It is about an aspiring director who gets a chance of making his first horror thriller. In order to make one, he decides to know more about evil spirits. In a sudden turn of events there, an evil spirit called Divya (Rithika) starts chasing him and forces Ravi to cast her as the heroine of the film.
title: Rahasyam
plot: It is about an aspiring director who gets a chance of making his first horror thriller. In order to make one, he decides to know more about evil spirits. In a sudden turn of events there, an evil spirit called Divya (Rithika) starts chasing him and forces Ravi to cast her as the heroine of the film.
